title: Skin Sales
body:
Hi Guys
So I was wondering can be got on sale if you apply to riot. Like for example 16 days ago Pool Party Lee Sin was on sale if I send a support ticket to riot can I get it on sale? I really want the skin by the way but I cant get it without it being on sale
Regards Jomoko2012

replies.body:
Sadly not.
I don't mean to offend you or anything, but Riot wouldn't make a skin for sale because one in a few million league players asked for it.

Nah, sorry you missed out, but you are going to have to wait for the next time he comes on sale. If you could request a skin on sale there would be 0 point in actually having sales and Riot support would be flooded with these types of requests. 

 If you are lucky it will be one of the skins on sale if we unlock it during pool party week ♥
